ygData.msgSnippet: ... There s still something buggy going on as well.  I m still taking faction hits in Solusek for mobs that other people pull past my group (which isn t
ygData.messageBody:
On Fri, 24 Sep 1999 jhenders@... wrote:
>
> This doesn't explain situations I've seen where another group is
> fighting a mob (not one of the ones they are ignoring) and it stops part
> way through the fight to run over and take a whack at the bard in
> another group. I've seen this in both Unrest and Cazic.

There's still something buggy going on as well. I'm still
taking faction hits in Solusek for mobs that other people pull
past my group (which isn't necessarily a bad thing since I
want to increase my faction with the fire giants and Solusek
mining company).

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
